item.title: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:3, topic:457150”] if (c.killerId != c.playerId) if(c.inWild() && o.inWild()) { o.pkPoints += 5; o.sendMessage("You have defeated " +Misc.optimizeTex(c.playerName) + "."); o.sendMessage("You have received five PvP Points from your most recent kill."); }

What I did: Changed the c.pkPoints += 5; to o.pkPoints += 5; The c instance represents the player who has died, instead it should have been the o instance which represents the player who killed them. This will also fix receiving points when you die. Also i fixed the grammar.[/quote]

There ya go.

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem

item.title: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Replace the code that looks familiar to this and only this.

	if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
		if(c.inWild() && o.inWild()) {
			o.pkPoints += 5;
			o.sendMessage("You have defeated " +Misc.optimizeTex(c.playerName) + ".");
			o.sendMessage("You have received five PvP Points from your most recent kill.");
		}

What I did: Changed c.pkPoints += 5; to o.pkPoints += 5; The c instance represents the player who has died, instead it should have been the o instance which represents the player who has killed them. This will also fix receiving points when you die. Also I fixed the grammar.

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem

item.title: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Turmoilz1337x, post:1, topic:457150”]Sooo On My Hybrid PVP Source I’ve Been Working on For A While, When You Die You Get PKP. Doesn’t Matter If It’s From Overloads, an NPC, or Another Player, You Still Do… So. Can Anybody Help Me?

public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 10; c.isDead = false; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){ } if (c.killerId != c.playerId) o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); if(c.inWild()){ c.pkPoints += 5; o.sendMessage("You have received 5 Pk Points"); } c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } } }[/quote]

When it checks for the Wilderness and adds the points, also have it check for the player being in combat with another player.

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem

item.title: Hybrid PVP PKP Error - Added Code To Show Problem
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

Sooo On My Hybrid PVP Source I’ve Been Working on For A While, When You Die You Get PKP. Doesn’t Matter If It’s From Overloads, an NPC, or Another Player, You Still Do… So. Can Anybody Help Me?

public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 10; c.isDead = false; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){ } if (c.killerId != c.playerId) o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); if(c.inWild()){ c.pkPoints += 5; o.sendMessage("You have received 5 Pk Points"); } c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } } }

Read full topic
